oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Ramblin' Lou's 30th Anniversary Show at Melody Fair (18999)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Anderson, Bill, 1937-; Ramblin' Lou Family Band; Turner, Mary Lou; Fairs; Metal photoplates;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and black on brown) announcing Ramblin' Lou's 30th Anniversary Show featuring Bill Anderson, Mary Lou Turner, Ramblin' Lou, Joanie Marshall, and the WXRL Ramblers at the Melody Fair on September 24. Poster features metal photoplates of Bill Anderson and Mary Lou Turner. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/48712/
